title: OpenMPI builds fail when +pmi specified.
body:
The OpenMPI build fails if you specify +pmi. Here the error:

```
==> openmpi: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-openmpi-4.0.5-pc4k2ix6bu3cc7swgxryehror6iwhyxl/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/root/spack/opt/spack/linux-tlinux2-x86_64/gcc-10.2.0/openmpi-4.0.5-pc4k2ix6bu3cc7swgxryehror6iwhyxl' '--enable-shared' '--disable-silent-rules' '--enable-builtin-atomics' '--enable-static' '--with-pmi' '--with-zlib=/root/spack/opt/spack/linux-tlinux2-x86_64/gcc-10.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-silraucp43hmh63ujxm53fenf4cnhsf7' '--enable-mpi1-compatibility' '--without-tm' '--without-lsf' '--without-sge' '--without-alps' '--without-loadleveler' '--without-slurm' '--disable-memchecker' '--with-hwloc=/root/spack/opt/spack/linux-tlinux2-x86_64/gcc-10.2.0/hwloc-2.2.0-ukg2eiqdppscusmabz2np6h6e56w36au' '--disable-java' '--disable-mpi-java' '--without-cuda' '--enable-wrapper-rpath' '--disable-wrapper-runpath' '--disable-mpi-cxx' '--disable-cxx-exceptions' '--with-wrapper-ldflags=-Wl,-rpath,/root/spack/opt/spack/linux-tlinux2-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-10.2.0-afrqb5uolgfmlatynlj73bzkwe7a73lp/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/10.2.0 -Wl,-rpath,/root/spack/opt/spack/linux-tlinux2-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-10.2.0-afrqb5uolgfmlatynlj73bzkwe7a73lp/lib64'

1 error found in build log:
     163    configure: WARNING:     /slurm
     164    configure: WARNING: Specified path: yes
     165    configure: WARNING: OR neither libpmi, libpmi2, or libpmix were found under:
     166    configure: WARNING:     /lib
     167    configure: WARNING:     /lib64
     168    configure: WARNING: Specified path:
  >> 169    configure: error: Aborting
```

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1358-47a7cd6
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-tlinux2-x86_64
```

I've also attached the build-out log.
